notes.note: Connected to public Collective Knowledge Repository [$#cm_4d63887b5cda54aa_df354bed9593719c#$]

1st open, reproducible and Pareto efficient SW/HW co-design competition for deep learning (speed, accuracy, costs) uses CK to put ML and systems researchers on the same page and share produced artifacts as reusable, portable and customizable components (open science) [$#cm_77154d189d2e226c_30191f423b87244b#$]

title: Android application "Crowdsource Experiments"
to: for collaborative hardware and software optimization and machine learning using  Android-based mobile devices provided by volunteers

urls.title: Related program for deep learning at Google Play Website
